title: AbuBhakar
author: AbuBhakar
content: Paalala: Ang listahan na ito ay para lamang sa 100 na user na pinaka aktibo dito sa local board. Excluded ang mga local user na hindi nagpopost sa Pilipinas board. Ang pagkakasund sunod sa listahan ay base sa dami ng post na nagawa sa Pilipinas board, Pinakamataas pababa.Listahan ng pinaka aktibong user at natitirang merit para magrank-up simula 01/01/2022 - comments.author: Asuspawer09
comments.body: Seems like naman medjo maganda ang takbo ng Pilipinas Board pero bumaba ang post naten sa Local ayon dito sa Chart for March 2023 dati ay umaabot ng 2000+ ang post naten sa local. Pero pansin ko naman dumami ang active ngayon pero pagdating sa merit ay medjo tagilid tayo dahil din siguro wala tayong merit source.Mukang matatagalan magrank up ang mga local posters naten. Great list ito para sa mga active users naten sa Local pero masasayang din if walang kulang tayo sa merits na maipapamigay. Siguro encourage naten na magbigay ng merits sa mga useful at high quality post dito sa Local board.Quote from: Rikafip on April 11, 2023, 06:44:51 AMRejoice, its time for yet another brief monthly overview of the local boards activity.    As always charts and table are made using data from @DdmrDdmr Merit Dashboard and @TryNinja Ninjastic.space. Thanks guys for your awesome tools!Communities marked with * (Pakistan, Bangladesh) don't have their own local boards. Not yet at least. Post activity per local board during March 2023During above mentioned period 1452 posts were written across 18 local boards, which is a ~20% increased compared to February 2023 and 13576 posts. I must say that I didn't expect this increase considering the overall situation and trend, but it was a certainly a good surprise and hopefully we can continue like that in the coming months.As always, Russian board was far ahead of others, followed by Turkish and German boards. Generally, majority of boards had increased activity while among the more active boards only Nigerian had significant decrease (several less active boards had decrease too but those boards usually have big amplitudes).Local Board post raceCourtesy of bitmover, animated chart of the local board post raceActive member per local board during March 2023Since amount of posts went up by 20%, no surprise that the same thing happened with amount of active members. During March 1369 members wrote at least 1 post which is a solid ~10% increase compared to February numbers (1232). Russian board is once again far ahead, and German & Turkish behind them. After strong growth in the last few months, Nigerian didn't break the 100 active members barrier and even had a slight decrease which is not surprising considering that their amount of posts went down as well.When it comes to amount of members (percentage wise, relative to the total amount of members) who wrote only 1 post during March, this time Bangladesh and Turkish local boards were ahead of the others with 70%, followed by Greek (62%) and Indian (60%) local boards. On the other hand, Pilipinas and Nigerian boards had the least mount of such members (22%) followed by Bangladesh and Turkish with 25%.In the 2-9 posts group, Bangladesh was ahead of the others with 48% and  German % Nigerian close behind at the 2nd with 47% each. On the other side are Roamian (10%), Polish (20%) and French (22%).In the 10+ posts group, Pakistan board is ahead with 44% of such members, followed by Croatian (41%) and French (38%) local boards. Least amount of those members have Indian (7%), Greek (13%) and Romanian (20%) local boardsMerit shared per local board during March 2023Since amount of posts increased by ~20%, I naturally expected for same thing to happen with merits shared and I wasn't disappointed; during March 8479 merits was shared acorss 19 local boards which is a huge ~60% increase compared to February and 5214 merits shared. As always, majority of such a big increase we can thank to historically most merited boards: Russian (859-1739), German (444-1143) and Turkish (615-1149), but this time Indonesian board joined too with ~160% increase (376-966) and the biggest amount of merits shared in the last three years (since I make these overviews).Merit senders and receivers per local board during March 2023Several local boards stick out on this chart (Nigerian, Pilipinas) meaning they have a lrage amount of merit senders/receivers compared to the total amount of merits shared that might suggest they could use more merit sources. Since no one expressed their opinion on how this chart should be sorted I will keep it as it is, meaning it will be sorted by the amount of merits shared.Merit/Post ratio per local board for March 2023Last but not the least in this series of chart, merit/post raio. Since amount of posts increased by 20% and merits by 60%, its no surprise that blue colour dominates the chart, with only Italian, Spanish and Nigerian boards having lower March than 12 month ratio. Romanian and Arabic and at their usual 1st and 2nd place this and buig surprise this month is Indonesian with 1.19 merits per postthat is a huge increase compared to their usual numbers, as seen on the chart. [CHARTS] Brief monthly overview of the local boards activity

comments.author: jeraldskie11
comments.body: Napakagandang initiative ang ginawa mo at masaya ako na makita ang panagalan dito na isa sa mga aktibong poster dito sa local board.Nakakahikayat rin ito ng mga user na magpost sa ating local board since inuupdate naman ang list ng mga aktibong user.Salamat sa effort mo kabayan, naapreciate ko ito.May suggestions lang ako, mas maganda siguro kung sa "Pangalan" na seksyon ay lagyan ng "profile link" upang makita ng ating mga kababayan ang iba pang detalye ng ating profile, at madaling makita ang ating mga posts.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Maganda sana kung may summary ka ng data per rank para sa malapit ng mag rank up kagaya ng thread ni @Ratimov na Helping Potential Legendary, Hero, Senior and Full Members. Mas madali kasing malaman ng titingin sa list mo kung sino ang pwedeng matulungan sa merit. Masyadong generalize kasi yung less than 100 merit dahil iba’t iba ang merit requirements per rank. Pero ayos na din yan dahil konti pa naman tayong active dito sa local board. Keep it up!

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Actually maganda nga itong topic na ito para matulungan ang iba nating kabayan na malapit na mag rank up tsaka para nadin maging active ang ilan dito, its been a while na since nakapag up ako sa mga active users medyo busy eh by the way i created a thread before na encourage ko yung ilang mga new members na malapit na mag rank up para ilapag yung kanilang mga contents para naman makatulong tayo at sa mga gusto din mag bigay ng merit. [Merit] Quality content threads deserved to have merit.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Peanutswar on April 28, 2023, 12:59:46 PM[Merit] Quality content threads deserved to have merit.Ipagpatuloy mo lang ito kabayan. Pareho tayo ng goal na maging active ulit ang local board natin. Matagal din akong hindi tumambay sa local board natin simula ng tumigil ako sa translation works. Napansin ko lng na nawala na yung karamihan ng mga kasabayan ko dito at mga tropa ko sa social media. Napagiiwanan na din tayo pagdating sa merit distribution kahit na mga quality naman ang post ng mga kababayan natin kung ikukumpara sa ibang local na sagana sa merit.Keep collecting merit sa global at tulungan tayo dito sa local board para makausad ang mga kababayan natin na hindi maka rank. Sa totoo lang ay sobrang hirap makakuha ng merit kung wala kang kaclose na user na madalas magbigay ng merit kaya ramdam ko ang pinagdadaanan ng marami sa ating kasamahan dito sa local na sobrang taas na ng activity pero mababa pa dn ang rank dahil sa kakulangan sa merit.

comments.author: Bitcoinislife09
comments.body: Mukang maramirami pa ang kelangan kung merits para makaabot sa next na rank na senior member, Salamat sa thread na ito nasama rin ako sa list ng mga aktibong miyembro. Sinusubukan ku ulet maging aktibo sa Local Pilipinas napapansin ko rin na wala masyadong Local poster kaya madalas ay sinikikap ko rin na nakagawa ng topic na makakatulong sa mga miyembro. Tuloy lang naten ito dahil dumadami ang mga active na meyembro, madalas ay nirereserba ko ang mga merits ko para ibigay sa lokal board para makatulong. Happy posting sa aten mga kababayan.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.created_time: April 29, 2023, 08:24:57 AMLast edit: May 02, 2023, 09:36:44 AM by PX-Z
comments.body: Nice list, make this updated siguro every 14 days particularly kada pag update ng activity baka merong bagong mag rank up ng local members.Also, merong error sa list, checked this user kase na gulat ako from Jr. to Sr. Edit: edited to check the image from talkimg

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: Malayo layo pa ang tatakbuhin ko para maging legendary pero okay lang. Ganitong typical discussions lang at kung merong maka appreciate ng posts ko salamat sa inyo mga kabayan. Natural na takbol ang ang gusto ko at masaya lang ako ulit na makabalik sa forum at sumali sa mga discussions. Para sa mga malapit na rumank up, pag may makita akong mga posts na para sa akin deserve ng merit tutulong ako sa inyo guys. Sana maging active na ulit itong local forum natin at magsibalikan na ulit yung mga naging inactive lalo na magkakaroon ng bull run inaasahan ko na madaming babalik o di kaya mas lalong maging active ulit tayong lahat dito.

comments.author: 0t3p0t
comments.body: Kasali pala ako sa top 100 poster sa local board pero mahaba-haba pa lalakbayin ko dito para magrank-up dahil need ko pa ng 150+ merits para maabot ko ang Hero Member rank. Though malayo pa sa katotohanan pero excited parin ako dahil alam ko na pakonti-konti ay makuha ko rin ang nasabing rank. 😁

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Mukhang kailangan na din ng Update ng thread dahil may mga ilang nag rank up na mula sa thread creations , sila Bisdak and Julerz are already ranked up. ganon din sila Logitchmouse and Mr.Magkaisa .Quote from: 0t3p0t on December 15, 2023, 01:48:33 AMKasali pala ako sa top 100 poster sa local board pero mahaba-haba pa lalakbayin ko dito para magrank-up dahil need ko pa ng 150+ merits para maabot ko ang Hero Member rank. Though malayo pa sa katotohanan pero excited parin ako dahil alam ko na pakonti-konti ay makuha ko rin ang nasabing rank. 😁sa pagkaactive mo now kabayan , mukhang mabilis mo lang ma attain yang ranking na need mo , konting tyaga lang at sipag pa magugulat ka nalang nag rank up kana.
